home.welcomeBadge: Welcome to the Future of Education
home.heroDescription: Immerse yourself in cutting-edge AI courses with in-depth experience which will open your eyes for the future. Learn from industry experts and build real-world projects.
home.tutorSubtitle: Your personal guide through the world of AI
home.tutorRole: Your Guide Through the World of AI
home.tutorDescription: With rich experience in generative artificial intelligence, I've dedicated my career to making complex AI concepts accessible and engaging. From writing a perfect prompt to creating new worlds, AI RUNNER 2033 provides you with the tools and knowledge to thrive in the AI-driven future.
home.workshopsSubtitle: Real lessons. Real growth. Real people.
home.feature1Desc: AI Runner redefines learning for a generation growing up with machines. We teach not only how AI works, but why it matters — guiding students, teachers, and creators to use technology with empathy, imagination, and safety.
home.feature2Desc: We empower young minds to explore modern technology with curiosity and confidence — shaping individuals ready for both innovation and responsibility.
home.feature3Desc: AI Runner links classrooms, experts, and innovators into one creative ecosystem. Together we build projects that don't just advance technology — they advance humanity, cultivating a future defined by wisdom, cooperation, and ethical use of AI.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Those who believed in me when this was just a spark of an idea.
home.testimonial1Content: Robert is an exceptionally careful and dedicated creator who knows how to combine art, technology, and a vision of the future. His work in the field of artificial intelligence shows how important it is for young people to think boldly and seek new paths between creativity and innovation. Such individuals push the boundaries of what is possible.
home.testimonial2Role: Principal at Hajdina Elementary school and Founder of iSchool
home.testimonial2Content: The AI workshop led by Robert sparked genuine interest in the future of technology and creativity among our ninth graders. Robert knew how to present artificial intelligence in a way that inspires and opens up new perspectives—among both teachers and students. Workshops like this are extremely important because they open the door to digital literacy for young people and prepare them for a future in which knowledge of AI will be crucial.
home.testimonial3Content: Working with Robert on AI education initiatives has been an exceptional experience. His ability to bridge the gap between complex AI concepts and practical application is remarkable. Robert's workshops at VIST have not only enhanced our students' understanding of artificial intelligence but have also inspired them to pursue innovative projects. His dedication to making AI accessible and his forward-thinking approach make him an invaluable partner in preparing the next generation for the technological challenges ahead.
home.testimonial4Role: Principal at ACADEMIA, Academy of Applied Sciences
home.testimonial4Content: Robert's contribution to AI education at ACADEMIA has been transformative. His comprehensive approach to teaching artificial intelligence combines theoretical knowledge with hands-on experience, which is exactly what our students need to succeed in today's rapidly evolving tech landscape. The workshops he conducted have significantly enhanced our curriculum and provided our students with practical skills that are directly applicable to their future careers. Robert's passion for AI education and his ability to inspire young minds make him an outstanding educator.
home.ctaDescription: Join AI Runner 2033 today and unlock your full potential by mastering how to communicate with AI and use it to your advantage.

courses.subtitle: Practical lessons designed to transform you into an Gen-AI expert
courses.ctaTitle: Tell Us Exactly What You Are Looking For
courses.ctaDescription: Contact us to suggest new courses, share your own AI products or get personalized learning recommendations

about.subtitle: On a mission to democratize AI education and prepare learners for the future of technology. Our online platform combines cutting-edge curriculum with an immersive learning experience.
about.story1: Founded in 2025, AI Runner 2033 was born from a vision of AI media engineer, Robert Vogrinec to transform how people learn about artificial intelligence. Robert's philosophy is not biased but rather taking a safe, practical and most importantly, useful approach.
about.story2: Our founders, a team of project leaders, teachers, and principals, came together to create an advanced online learning platform that doesn't just teach concepts—it brings them to life through a unique workflow which is suitable for all ages and skill levels.
about.story3: Today, AI Runner 2033 serves thousands of students, from complete beginners to advanced practitioners, helping them master AI skills through hands-on projects, real-world applications, and a supportive community.
about.coreValuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.value1Desc: Empowering the next generation of AI innovators with cutting-edge education and immersive learning experiences.
about.value2Desc: Staying ahead of the curve with the latest AI technologies and teaching methodologies.
about.value3Desc: Building a global network of AI enthusiasts, learners, and professionals supporting each other.
about.value4Desc: Accelerated courses designed to get you from beginner to expert in record time.
about.joinMissionDesc: I'm always looking for passionate students, developers, and AI enthusiasts to join my team and help shape the future of AI education. Please share your final products, ideas, or feedback with me.

contact.subtitle: Have questions about AI or the courses? Robert personally reads and responds to every message. Get expert guidance on your learning journey.
